ECSchema.description: The GeotechnicalInterpretation schema defines classes that represent data for interpreting the earth's subterranean structure based on limited geotechnical exploration.

ECEntityClass.description: GeotechnicalInterpretationPartition element indicates that there is a specialized Geotechnical Interpretation perspective for the parent Subject.
Model containing elements related to Geotechnical Interpretations.
Abstract superclass for all spatially-located Geotechnical Interpretation classes.
Abstract superclass for all non-spatially-located Geotechnical Interpretation classes.
A geotechnical interpretation of a region of the earth's subsurface. Interpretations always have a GeotechnicalInterpretationModel submodel.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference to GeotechnicalInterpretationConfiguration that is used by this Interpretation.

ECEntityClass.description: The configuration for one or more GeoExp:Interpretation.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a specific GeoInterp:Interpretation has a configuration of GeoInterp:GeotechnicalInterpretationConfiguration.

ECEntityClass.description: A mapping from a GeoExp:GeotechnicalInvestigationConfiguration to a GeoInterp:GeotechnicalInterpretationConfiguration.

ECProperty.description: Identifies the GeoExp:ILithology subclass that maps to GeoInterp:Material

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference to GeoExp:GeotechnicalInvestigationConfiguration that is being mapped.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a specific GeoInterp:InvestigationMapping maps a GeoExp:GeotechnicalInvestigationConfiguration.

ECEntityClass.description: A geotechnical material, uniform for the purposes of the interpretation.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Every IMaterial owns a ReferenceMaterial.

ECEntityClass.description: A geotechnical material, from the lithography perspective (boring logs, etc.).
An IMaterial that is an alias for a Material.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Required reference to the Material being renamed.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relates an AliasMaterial to the Material it renames.
Maps GeoExp:ILithology to the GeoInterp:Material that represents that material.
Maps a GeoExp:LegendCode to a GeoInterp:Material.
Maps a GeoExp:GeologyCode to a GeoInterp:Material.
Maps a GeoExp:AlternateGeologyCode to a GeoInterp:Material.

ECEntityClass.description: An IOperand that can provide a GeologicalHistory.
An Element describing the geological history of the region being interpreted.
A step in geologic history representing a consistent process that influenced the present geology.

ECProperty.description: The zero-based index of the step, with zero being the earliest step.

ECEntityClass.description: A GeologicalHistoryStep that adds Material to the geology.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a AdditiveGeologicalHistoryStep adds a specific Material.

Target.roleLabel: adds material and is driven by

ECEntityClass.description: An IOperand that can provide a set of Boreholes.
An IBoreholeProvider that is a non-exclusive collection of Boreholes.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Includes a Borehole into a BoreholeGroup

ECEntityClass.description: An IBoreholeProvider that is an exclusive collection of Boreholes.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Optional reference to GeoExp:GeotechnicalInvestigationElement that is source for this BoreholeSource.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relates a BoreholeSource to the GeoExp:GeotechnicalInvestigationElement it was derived from.

ECEntityClass.description: A borehole or other investigation producing data similar to borehole logs.

ECProperty.description: This Borehole should be considered in calculations.
The path of the Borehole from the surface downward.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Optional reference to GeoExp:ExploratoryLocation that is source for this Borehole.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relates a Borehole to the GeoExp:ExploratoryLocation it was derived from.

ECEntityClass.description: A contiguous portion of a Borehole with a constant Material. Always parented by Borehole.

ECProperty.description: The location this MaterialDepthRange (portion of the parent Borehole path).
Distance from ground surface to top of depth range.
Distance from ground surface to bottom of depth range.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a MaterialDepthRange has a material of Material.

Target.roleLabel: has material and is driven by

ECEntityClass.description: A location down a Borehole defining the border of saturated and unsaturated soil.

ECProperty.description: The location this WaterTableDepth (along the parent Borehole path).
Distance from ground surface to water table.

ECEntityClass.description: An IOperand that can provide a FenceDiagram.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Connects an GroundGeneration with its child input IFenceDiagramProviders.

Target.roleLabel: is owned by and is input for

ECEntityClass.description: A vertical slice through Ground, that allows display and editing of strata boundaries.

ECProperty.description: The width (half either side) of the FenceDiagram, for use in finding related Boreholes.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define the FenceDiagram is guided by the Borehole.

ECEntityClass.description: A portion of a FenceDiagram, extending between FencePosts. Always child of FenceDiagram.

ECProperty.description: The zero-based index of the FencePanel relative to other FencePanels in the FenceDiagram.
A cached value of the distance from the start FencePost to the end FencePost.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define the FencePanel is bounded by the FencePost.
Relationship to define the FenceVolume is bounded by the left side of the FenceBoundary.
Relationship to define the FenceVolume is bounded by the right side of the Boundary.

ECEntityClass.description: The start/end location of one or more FencePanels. Conceptually an infinite vertical line.

ECProperty.description: The 2D location of this FencePost (in global coordinates).

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define the FencePost is located at a Borehole.

ECEntityClass.description: A contiguous 2D region that is part of a FenceDiagram and is bounded by FenceBoundaries.

ECProperty.description: The shape (a 2D polygon) in FenceDiagram coordinates.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define the FenceVolume is bounded by the FenceBoundary.
Relationship to define the FenceVolume is bounded by the left side of the FenceBoundary.

Target.roleLabel: is bounded by left side of

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define the FenceVolume is bounded by the right side of the Boundary.

Target.roleLabel: is bounded by right side of

ECEntityClass.description: A stratum within a FenceDiagram.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference to IMaterial of the FenceStratum (required).

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a FenceStratum has a material of Material.

ECEntityClass.description: The boundary of 1 or 2 FenceStratums.

ECProperty.description: A 2D polyline in FenceDiagram coordinates.
Was this FenceBoundary specified by the user (and is not just a reflection of the generated Ground).

ECEntityClass.description: A 2D region of interest.

ECProperty.description: A 2D polygon.

ECEntityClass.description: A 2D (vertical) cross section of interest.

ECProperty.description: A 2D line segment.

ECEntityClass.description: A link to a PLAXIS 3D model.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference to the region of the interpretation being linked.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a Region is linked by the Plaxis3dLink.

ECEntityClass.description: A link to a PLAXIS 2D model.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference to the section of the interpretation being linked.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a Region is linked by the Plaxis3dLink.

ECEntityClass.description: An interface that defines an IOperand that can provide a surface.
A surface of unknown meaning.

ECProperty.description: Contiguous IndexedPolyface defining the geometry of the surface. May be closed.

ECEntityClass.description: An IOperand that can provide a Ground.
A approximation of the structure of the ground at surface level and below.
A contiguous 3D volume that is part of a Ground and is bounded by Boundaries.

ECProperty.description: A closed IndexedPolyface that defines a cache of the geometry of the 3D volume.

ECEntityClass.description: A contiguous surface that bounds Volumes. Always a child of Subsurface.

ECProperty.description: Contiguous IndexedPolyface defining the geometry of the surface. May be closed.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define the Volume is bounded by the Boundary.
Relationship to define the GroundVolume is bounded by the positive side of the Boundary.

Target.roleLabel: is bounded by positive side of

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define the GroundVolume is bounded by the negative side of the Boundary.

Target.roleLabel: is bounded by negative side of

ECEntityClass.description: A fault block or similar region of consistent Stratums. Always child of Ground.
A GroundVolume representing a stratum of constant material. Always child of Block.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference to IMaterial of the Stratum (required).

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define that a Stratum has a material of Material.

ECEntityClass.description: A border between saturated and unsaturated soil. Always child of Block.

ECProperty.description: Contiguous surface defining the geometry of the WaterTable. May be closed.

ECEntityClass.description: An Element representing the order of IMaterials in the Block's Stratums. Always child of Block.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Relationship to define the order of IMaterials in a Block's Stratums.

ECProperty.description: 1-based top-to-bottom index of the layer of the IMaterial

ECEntityClass.description: An Operation that generates a Ground from boreholes, terrain surfaces, etc..

ECRelationshipClass.description: Connects a GroundGeneration with its input IBoreholeProvider.

Source.roleLabel: is borehole input for and drives

Target.roleLabel: has borehole input and is driven by

ECRelationshipClass.description: Connects an GroundGeneration with its input (terrain) ISurfaceProvider.

Source.roleLabel: is terrain input for and drives

Target.roleLabel: has terrain input and is driven by

ECRelationshipClass.description: Connects a GroundGeneration with its output Ground.

ECEntityClass.description: Element which can be used as input to an Operation and/or may be output from an Operation.
Abstract superclass for an operation that takes IOperand inputs and produces an IOperand result.

ECProperty.description: This Operation has not be run since the last input change.

ECRelationshipClass.description: Connects an Operation with its (non-child) input IOperands.
Connects an Operation with its child input IOperands.

Target.roleLabel: is owned by and is input for

ECRelationshipClass.description: Connects an Operation with its output IOperands.

ECEntityClass.description: Parameters that are related to an Operation and are conceptually part of the Operation.
An IOperand that can be used as input for all Operations.
A UniversalOperand representing no-results-produced-by-an-Operation.
A UniversalOperand representing error-instead-of-results-produced-by-an-Operation.

ECProperty.description: Information about the error.

ECEntityClass.description: For testing purposes only.

ECProperty.description: For testing surface meshes.

ECEntityClass.description: For testing purposes only.

ECProperty.description: For testing BREP volume performance/strategy.

ECEntityClass.description: An Operation that transforms one or more surfaces into another surface

ECRelationshipClass.description: Connects a SurfaceTransformation with its input ISurfaceProvider(s).

Source.roleLabel: is surface input for and drives

Target.roleLabel: has surface input and is driven by

ECRelationshipClass.description: Connects a SurfaceTransformation with its output ISurfaceProvider.
